title: Prices of season tickets of the Bundesliga clubs in 2019/2020
summary: You are viewing a chart of multi-line type with 2 lines denoting Standing places, and Most expensive seats. The y axis indicates the Ticket Prices and the x axis indicates Year.
Overall Standing places, and Most expensive seats are roughly constant,  throughout the Year
The ranking of the lines from topmost to botommmost is as follows: 1. Most expensive seats, and lastly, 2. Standing places.
Overall across the Year, Most expensive seats mostly maintained the highest Ticket Prices when compared to others with a mean value of 724.61, and it peaked at FSV_Mainz_05.
The botommost line, Standing places,  has a mean of 280.39, and peaked at Schalke_04.
min_summary: You are viewing a chart of multi-line type with 2 lines denoting Standing places, and Most expensive seats. The y axis indicates the Ticket Prices and the x axis indicates Year.
Overall Standing places, and Most expensive seats are roughly constant,  throughout the Year
Overall across the Year, Most expensive seats mostly maintained the highest Ticket Prices when compared to others with a mean value of 724.61, and it peaked at FSV_Mainz_05.
Standing places mostly had the least Ticket Prices with a mean value of 280.39, which peaked at Schalke_04 with a value of 1905.0.

The ranking of the lines from topmost to botommmost is as follows: 1. Most expensive seats, and lastly, 2. Standing places.

max_summary: The given chart is of multi-line type with 2 lines namely Standing places, and Most expensive seats. The y axis represents Ticket Prices and the x axis represents Year.
Overall Standing places, and Most expensive seats are roughly constant,  throughout the Year
The lines ordered according to average values of Ticket Prices in descending order is: 1. Most expensive seats, and lastly, 2. Standing places.
Overall across the Year, Most expensive seats mostly maintained the highest Ticket Prices when compared to others with a mean value of 724.61, and it peaked at FSV_Mainz_05.
The botommost line, Standing places,  has a mean of 280.39, and peaked at Schalke_04.
The greatest difference of Ticket Prices between Standing places and Most expensive seats occurs at Year Schalke_04 and the smallest difference occurs at VFL_Wolfsburg.
